verses.verse: Then he brought me back <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the outer <S%H2435><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, which looketh <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%>; and it was shut <S%H5462><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H8179><s%>, This gate shall be shut <S%H5462><s%>; it shall not be opened <S%H6605><s%>, neither shall any man <S%H376><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> in by it <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hath entered <S%H935><s%> in by it <S%H5462><s%>; therefore it shall be shut.

As for the prince <S%H5387><s%>, he shall sit <S%H3427><s%> therein as prince <S%H5387><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; he shall enter <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, and shall go out <S%H3318><s%> by the way of the same <S%H1870><s%>.

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>; and I looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H3519><s%>, behold, the glory of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and I fell <S%H5307><s%> upon my face <S%H6440><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, mark <S%H7760><s%> well <S%H3820><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> with thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> with thine ears <S%H241><s%> all that I say <S%H1696><s%> unto thee concerning all the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and all the laws <S%H8451><s%> thereof <S%H7760><s%>; and mark well <S%H3820><s%> the entrance <S%H3996><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, with every egress <S%H4161><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>.

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> to the rebellious <S%H4805><s%>, even to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: O ye house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, let it suffice <S%H7227><s%> you of all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>,

in that ye have brought <S%H935><s%> in foreigners <S%H1121><s%>, uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> and uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in flesh <S%H1320><s%>, to be in my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, to profane <S%H2490><s%> it <S%H1004><s%>, even my house, when ye offer <S%H7126><s%> my bread <S%H3899><s%>, the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and they have broken <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>, to add <S%H413><s%> unto all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

And ye have not kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of my holy things <S%H6944><s%>; but ye have set <S%H7760><s%> keepers <S%H8104><s%> of my charge <S%H4931><s%> in my sanctuary for yourselves <S%H4720><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, No foreigner <S%H1121><s%>, uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> and uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in flesh <S%H1320><s%>, shall enter <S%H935><s%> into my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, of any foreigners that are among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that went far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H3478><s%>, when Israel went astray <S%H8582><s%>, that went astray <S%H8582><s%> from me after <S%H310><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%>, they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Yet they shall be ministers <S%H8334><s%> in my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, having oversight <S%H6486><s%> at the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%>: they shall slay <S%H7819><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%>, and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them to minister unto them <S%H8334><s%>.

Because they ministered <S%H8334><s%> unto them before <S%H6440><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%>, and became a stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of iniquity <S%H5771><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; therefore have I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against them <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

And they shall not come near <S%H5066><s%> unto me <S%H3547><s%>, to execute the office of priest unto me <S%H5066><s%>, nor to come near to any of my holy things <S%H6944><s%>, unto the things that are most holy <S%H6944><s%>; but they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%>, and their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they have committed <S%H6213><s%>.

Yet will I make <S%H5414><s%> them keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, for all the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof <S%H6213><s%>, and for all that shall be done therein.

But the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, that kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went astray <S%H8582><s%> from me <S%H7126><s%>, they shall come near to me to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto me <S%H5975><s%>; and they shall stand before <S%H6440><s%> me to offer <S%H7126><s%> unto me the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>:

they shall enter <S%H935><s%> into my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, and they shall come near <S%H7126><s%> to my table <S%H7979><s%>, to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto me <S%H8104><s%>, and they shall keep my charge <S%H4931><s%>.

And it shall be that <S%H935><s%>, when they enter in at the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, they shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen <S%H6593><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>; and no wool <S%H6785><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> upon them <S%H8334><s%>, while they minister in the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, and within <S%H1004><s%>.

They shall have linen <S%H6593><s%> tires <S%H6287><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>, and shall have linen <S%H6593><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> upon their loins <S%H4975><s%>; they shall not gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with anything that causeth sweat <S%H3154><s%>.

And when they go forth <S%H3318><s%> into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, even into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%>, they shall put off <S%H6584><s%> their garments <S%H899><s%> wherein they minister <S%H8334><s%>, and lay <S%H3240><s%> them in the holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%>; and they shall put <S%H3847><s%> on other <S%H312><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, that they sanctify <S%H6942><s%> not the people <S%H5971><s%> with their garments <S%H899><s%>.

Neither shall they shave <S%H1548><s%> their heads <S%H7218><s%>, nor suffer their locks <S%H6545><s%> to grow long <S%H7971><s%>; they shall only <S%H3697><s%> cut off the hair <S%H6545><s%> of their heads <S%H7218><s%>.
Neither shall any of the priests <S%H3548><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%>, when they enter <S%H935><s%> into the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>.

Neither shall they take <S%H3947><s%> for their wives <S%H802><s%> a widow <S%H490><s%>, nor her that is put away <S%H1644><s%>; but they shall take <S%H3947><s%> virgins <S%H1330><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, or a widow <S%H490><s%> that is the widow of a priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And they shall teach <S%H3384><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> the difference between the holy <S%H6944><s%> and the common <S%H2455><s%>, and cause them to discern <S%H3045><s%> between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>.

And in a controversy <S%H7379><s%> they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%>; according to mine ordinances <S%H8199><s%> shall they judge <S%H8199><s%> it <S%H8104><s%>: and they shall keep my laws <S%H8451><s%> and my statutes <S%H2708><s%> in all my appointed feasts <S%H4150><s%>; and they shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.

And they shall go <S%H935><s%> in to no dead <S%H4191><s%> person <S%H120><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves <S%H1><s%>; but for father, or for mother <S%H517><s%>, or for son <S%H1121><s%>, or for daughter <S%H1323><s%>, for brother <S%H251><s%>, or for sister <S%H269><s%> that hath had no husband <S%H376><s%>, they may defile themselves <S%H2930><s%>.
And after <S%H310><s%> he is cleansed <S%H2893><s%>, they shall reckon <S%H5608><s%> unto him seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he goeth <S%H935><s%> into the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, into the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

And they shall have an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: I am their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>; and ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> them no possession <S%H272><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>; I am their possession <S%H272><s%>.

They shall eat <S%H398><s%> the meal-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the sin-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>; and every devoted thing <S%H2764><s%> in Israel shall be theirs <S%H3478><s%>.

And the first <S%H7225><s%> of all the first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> of every thing <S%H8641><s%>, and every oblation of everything <S%H8641><s%>, of all your oblations, shall be for the priest <S%H3548><s%>: ye shall also give <S%H5414><s%> unto the priests <S%H3548><s%> the first <S%H7225><s%> of your dough <S%H6182><s%>, to cause a blessing <S%H1293><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%> on thy house <S%H1004><s%>.
The priests <S%H3548><s%> shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of anything that dieth of itself <S%H5038><s%>, or is torn <S%H2966><s%>, whether it be bird <S%H5775><s%> or beast <S%H929><s%>.
